EmailTemplate.subject: Meet Chino The Chinook
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Honeywell understands that your aircraft are as much a part of the team as the troops they carry on-board. Take our Chino the Chinook - he's a character, never afraid to take troops into warfare or carry heavy loads to remote places. Chino maybe getting old, but he'll never let you down when you need him most. We're here to help you keep your own Chino the Chinook flying as long as possible, with several upgrade solutions available to help Chino avoid retirement. Why not book an appointment today to speak to our experts and keep Chino smiling!
HELP CHINO <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/ChinoChinook.html]]>
